about_the_game:
Late Stage is an immersive third-person stealth action game set in a dystopian world where the most powerful corporations rule the world. As a mercenary, players must take on various high-risk missions to earn the money needed to upgrade their equipment and hideout.

With a range of challenging objectives, from theft and espionage to heists and assassinations, players must use all their skills to outwit the enemy and complete each mission successfully. Along the way, they must remain undetected and avoid any obstacles that may stand in their way, using the environment to their advantage and utilizing their arsenal of high-tech gadgets and weaponry.

Developers

This is a project made by three people. The game has been in development for a short time, but is starting to get in shape. The game is inspired by classic stealth games from the 90’s and early 2000’s.

Issues

We are aware of certain performance issues and are actively working on optimizing the game. Fixes are on the way and will be available soon.
